entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:36 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 7:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: NNE 56 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 60 gusting to 90 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
